1607630.description:
âš ï¸WARRNINGâš ï¸

Some levels may make You see different things (when you finish playing), if you look at illusions for too long. The "GRID LEVEL" can be deadly. You run the game at your own risk.

INFORMATION

Listening to Synthwave/Retrowave most people have had this feeling of nostalgia for an era they didn't know or that never existed. The Retrowave Illusions based on "impossible shapes" M.C. Escher and inspired by THE IMPOSSIBLE game and by the '80s.




Retrowave illusions offers above all a visual and sound experience that will delight fans of the genre and will surely make those who don't know it yet discover this wonderful universe. Retrowave Illusions is unique experience of being immersed in wonderful world for at least a few moments.

FEATURES

  • Legendary Steam price 0.99 USD
  • Simple control (mouse, gamepad, keyboard WASD + CTRL)
  • Hint system
  • Synthwave music
  • Small application size
  • 30 levels
  • Beatiful minimalist graphic 80's
  • Linux, Windows and Mac OS support
  • All resolution supports (21:9, Ultrawide etc.)
  • Achievements
  • Steam clouds
